subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=|rs=齒05}}

# [[act]], [[scene]], as of a [[play]] or [[movie]]
# [[frame]], as of a [[comic]]
# [[section]], [[passage]], [[paragraph]]

subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=[[しゃく]] (shaku)
|kanon=[[せき]] (seki)
|on=[[せつ]] (setsu)
|kun=[[こま]] (koma)
}}
<!-- Readings need checking against verified-good sources. KANJIDIC etc. are not verified. Only finding ''seki'' and ''setsu'' as unclassified on'yomi in Shogakukan. -->

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|こま|yomi=k}}

Probably cognate with {{m|ja|小間}}, {{m|ja|細|tr=koma||small; a small piece of something}}.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|こま|コマ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=こま|film|animation|manga}} a [[frame]] of a [[comic]] or [[film]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=こま|film|theater}} an [[act]] or [[scene]] of a [[play]] or [[movie]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=こま|music}} a [[phrase]] or [[portion]] of a piece of [[music]]

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|せき}}

May be from {{der|ja|ltc|sort=せき|-}}, or may be a shift in reading from ''setsu'' below.

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: The ''seki'' reading appears to be somewhat more common for this sense.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|せつ}}

From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=せつ|齣}}. Compare modern {{cog|hak|-}} and {{cog|nan|-}} readings ''chhut'', {{cog|yue|-}} ''ceot<sup>1</sup>''.

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The ''seki'' reading appears to be somewhat more common for this sense.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>
